review: Recently I diagnosed with fibroids , since then I was looking for experience doctors for my surgery. Then one of my friends told me about Dr Deepika, that she is so experienced and from AIIMS hospital, I visited Definite cure clinic in south extension, she explained everything about my condition and advice for Laparoscopic surgery. Definite cure team took approval on same day and my surgery planned. Now I came for follow up, fully satisfied with Definite cure, specifically thanks to Dr Deepikaüëç

review: I came in touch with Dr. Deepika at the 7 months of my wife pregnancy. We were so worried for the delivery. But the doctor gave us good advice and explained everything in detail. Under supervision of Dr. Deepika we got our baby delivered at Aakash Hospital. Thank You so much Mam

review: I was facing major stomach cramps and acne issues. Dr. Deepika helped me a lot to come out of these situations. I would definitely  recommend  her without a second thought. She treated my acne and severe acne marks with the laser treatment. She is very friendly to her patients.

tags: Wait time,
review: Doctor didn‚Äôt turn up at 10 & asked me to come back at 11:30. I went back at 11:30 she didn‚Äôt show up. Her assistant asked me to get my BP and weight checked in the meantime. I asked her clearly tell me the truth what time the doctor will come. She asked me to come back in the evening. I mean seriously? Is it a joke? Disappointed with her unprofessional behaviour. Do not recommend at all.
reply_text:
Sorry for your inconvenience caused by us as I m a gynaecologist there are emergency all the time sometimes we need to give time to other patient who are in emergency
Thanks for sharing your problem
